attributes.action: Millions of Roma & Bulgarian Gypsies to BLIGHT the BENEFIT SYSTEM and must be STOPPED.
attributes.additional_details: AS BORDER restrictions on migrants from Romania and Bulgaria are to be lifted next year, Graeme Culliford travels to the heart of Transylvania to see first-hand how gypsies are being forced out of their homes by authorities — and are heading en masse to the UK for work, benefits and access to our healthcare
